name: Cool War
description:
YOU TUBE HERE I'm new follow me if you like 2D games

This is my first project inspired by Super Contra from the 1987 NES, it contains cartoon-style graphics and simple gameplay. Let me add your opinion.

The game is short single level

Medium difficulty.

Xbox-style controller compatible

 Shoot: Ctrl | X

Jump: Arrow up | A

Run: Keyboard arrows L/R
